thread.title: AAA/CAA Member Savings at Starwood Hotels
thread.title_full: AAA/CAA Member Savings at Starwood Hotels

title: AAA/CAA Member Savings at Starwood Hotels
text:
AAA/CAA Member Savings at Starwood Hotels AAA/CAA Member Savings at Starwood Hotels   8:37 PM 
AAA and CAA members are eligible for special Starwood discounts. Members can choose from the following savings options: Up to 15 percent off best available rates Daily breakfast for two Resort credit up to $100 
This offer is available at participating locations throughout the U.S., Canada, Mexico, French Polynesia, and the Caribbean with a minimum-night stay (varies by destination). A valid AAA membership is required at check-in. 
Some popular Starwood hotels include: Four Points by Sheraton Chicago Downtown - Magnificent Mile W New York Times Square Westin Gaslamp Quarter San Diego St. Regis San Francisco Sheraton Yankee Clipper Hotel - Ft. Lauderdale 
How to get this deal: For more information or to book, visit the AAA National Offer page on the Starwood Hotels website. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
